author: Staff Reporter
text:
An electrician who was crossing the railway track between Guduvanchery and Kattankulathur stations was knocked down by a speeding electrical multiple unit train on Friday morning.

Railway police said G. Suresh (49) of Meenakshi Nagar, Guduvanchery, was on his way to office when the train from Chengalpattu knocked him down.

He died instantly.
title: Electrician run over by train
